root.title: AI Applications
root.content:
Applications of AI

Artificial Intelligence is transforming numerous industries by enabling new capabilities and efficiencies.

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.content:
AI in Healthcare

AI is used for diagnostic imaging analysis (like X-rays and MRIs), personalized treatment plans, drug discovery, and robotic surgery.

finance.title: Finance
finance.content:
AI in Finance

In finance, AI powers algorithmic trading, fraud detection systems, credit scoring, and personalized financial advice through robo-advisors.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.content:
AI in Transportation

The most well-known application is in self-driving cars. AI is also used for traffic prediction, route optimization, and managing logistics for shipping and delivery.
